reviewText: I first saw 15degrees off cool on Comedy Central.  I can't remember when last I laughed so hard.  It was hilarious especially his last story about the air force.
summary: One of my top 3 favourite funniest comics
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: We laughed till we cried.  Bill Engvall is so easy to relate to, the Thunderbird jet segment just blew us away, we laugh just thinking about this DVD, we know many people that are 15 degrees off cool and sometimes so are we,  Engvall is so funny!!!!  THANKS for a million laughs.....
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: We probably have never laughed as hard as we did at this particular act.  His description of flying with the Blue Angels is side-splitting.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I highly recommend this DVD to anyone who likes Bill Engvall or just comedy specials in general. This was so amazing.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: Bill is just great in his way of delivery, smooth and talks about real things.  This one in particular is about remembering things in the past, funny times and comparison on kids now and before---  all true.  I dont think he is "off cool" at all -  I sure identify with his thinking on this material!  We all have our moments of how it  "was"  for us growing up and has it is now.  Funny guy!
summary: Awesome Comedy - Just Makes you Laugh!
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: My husband and I both love Bill Engvall and this is a great example of his brilliant comedy. I thought my husband was going to fall out of his chair he was laughing so hard.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I've always gotten a belly ache from laughing too hard at Bill Engvall's jokes and stories, but this DVD is his best yet in my opinion. His story about flying with the Blue Angels is especially hysterical. He is a very clean language comic, always has been and it is always refreshing to find someone that funny who doesn't use profanity.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I enjoy Bill Engvall's humor and bought this DVD because of it. The first half or so of the routine was the Engvall I hoped for...funny and presenting his somewhat eccentric take on life to which many (most?) of us can relate. Then came the bits that gave the concert its name;;;"15 Off Cool." As he went on about never quite being cool and his efforts to attain coolness, I started laughing harder and harder. It got to the point where my jaw was hurting from the laughter. That material is easily the funniest Engvall I've seen or heard, which is saying a lot!
summary: Starts out pretty good and then gets really funny
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: We love Bill Engvall and this is our favorite DVD.  Also have the CDand listen to it in the car on road trips.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: Bill's comedy routine is top-notch as usual.  It seems as though I am watching my life revealed.  Hilarious!!
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: This was my first experience with Bill Engvall's work. It will certainly not be the last. He is very funny, and there is very little coarseness to his language, something more comedians should take into consideration.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I love this Bill Engvall dvd. It kept me laughing. I would really recommend this to anyone looking for a good laugh.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I really enjoy watching Bill Engvall and Jeff Foxworthy, their humor is really good because of being family guys for so long.  So I have been trying to get their comedy acts on dvd.  I really enjoyed this dvd. This I believe was supposed to be about Bill's midlife crisis.  He wanted a motorcycle and his wife got him a scooter.  He talks about how when he was a kid and teenager, how all the other kids had cool posters in their rooms and neat cars.  But he always had the dorky posters and had a Gremlin.  This is a really good dvd to add to your comedy collection.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: Bill Engvall is one of our favorite comedians and he sure lived up to our expectations.  We love his humor because it is clean and hysterically funny.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: Being somewhat of a fan of Blue Collar Comedy Tour, I decided to focus on Bill Engvall.  I rented this DVD, not sure if I would like it.  Well, here's my opinion: It started off pretty slow, but right around the middle of it, Engvall really became a riot.  I loved everything about this DVD-the special features were great; I loved the behind the scenes feature on Bill's "Thunderbirds" segment.  The Delta Farce trailer was hilaious-I'll be seeing that!  But what topped it off for the special features was the bonus "Here's Your Sign" track.Basically, if you like Engvall or just Blue Collar in general, this is a must see.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: What a funny DVD!  Thanks for the fast service.  Sorry, I didn't get back to you as soon as I'd hoped.  Great service.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I could listen to Bill Engvall over and over again!  Every time I want some sweet comedy, I pull out this DVD.  I never tire of his stories.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: Bill Engvall is charming as always as he talks about his marital life, growing older, and what it was like to grow up a dork -- always "15 degrees off cool."  Laughs from beginning to end, no matter how cool you are, THINK you are, or never were! Something for just about everyone!
summary: A charmer for the "inner dork" in all of us!
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: If you like the Blue Collar shows & Bill Engvall, you will love this video...Bill is at his best.  The scooter & Blue Thunder segments are the most funny I have ever heard.  Great, great video.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: I love Bill Engvall! I got this DVD as a gift for Mother's Day. I was laughing so hard through almost the whole thing I was close to tears. If you love Bill, you will love this DVD. One of my favorite things about Bill Engvall is he is funny without using awful language so my kids can enjoy it too.
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool

reviewText: My wife and I love the Blue Collar Crew, all of them! Bill is on the loose again in this hilarious stand up routine!
summary: Cool and Nerdy at the same time!
Title: Bill Engvall: 15° Off Cool
